tasks.task_description: Phase 1: Create selfpartner@cloudnestle.com in Cognito
Phase 1: Add CloudNetsle to marketplace-users table with isSystemPartner flag
Phase 1: Create partner application for CloudNetsle
Phase 1: Add vendorId, commission_rate fields to solutions table schema
Phase 1: Update AWS Solution Finder with CloudNetsle userId
Phase 2: Update payment initiation to fetch price from solutions.pricing.proTier.amount
Phase 2: Update frontend to display price from /catalog/{solutionId}
Phase 3: Create marketplace-payment-gateways DynamoDB table
Phase 3: Create marketplace-platform-config DynamoDB table
Phase 3: Add Cashfree credentials to Secrets Manager
Phase 3: Create cashfree-payment.js handler
Phase 3: Create cashfree-webhook.js handler
Phase 3: Update transaction schema with paymentGateway, gatewayOrderId, gateway_data
Phase 3: Rename endpoint to /payments/initiate
Phase 3: Add solutionId to payment request body
Phase 3: Update webhook to use transaction.solutionId (not hardcoded)
Phase 3: Update email templates to fetch solution name dynamically
Phase 3: Delete old test transactions
Phase 4: Create /checkout page component
Phase 4: Build order summary section
Phase 4: Build payment gateway selector with radio buttons
Phase 4: Build billing address form (Name, Phone, Address, City, State, Pincode, Country)
Phase 4: Add form validation (phone, pincode, required fields)
Phase 4: Add terms checkbox and refund policy link
Phase 4: Add billing_address field to marketplace-users table
Phase 4: Implement address save and pre-fill logic
Phase 4: Integrate with /payments/initiate API
Test: End-to-end payment flow with PhonePe
Test: End-to-end payment flow with Cashfree
Test: Verify entitlements updated correctly
Deploy: Run deploy-full.sh for complete deployment

description: Marketplace Enhancements: Multi-solution support with dynamic pricing, multi-gateway payments, checkout page, and system partner setup
